name: Tjobs
overview:
Tjobs (via www.TjobsRecruit.com and currently www.Tjobs.ro) is a hybrid online/bricks-and-mortar business that for the first time combines the efficiency of a modern online recruitment portal with a fast growing proprietary network of currently over 500 recruitment agencies.

By way of a single dedicated contact, our enterprise clients tap into our network and a recruitment capacity of well over two million qualified and pre-screened candidates. We are using the full breadth and depth of internet technologies and network effects to supply hundreds of qualified temporary or permanent (predominantly blue collar) workers literally overnight, and provide consistent post-recruitment support.

Our online portal provides partner agencies with useful workflow tools and marketplace functionalities, while candidates find a constant stream of up-to-date high quality job offers.

Taken together, our staffing solutions ensure higher quality execution, more experienced and better suited personnel, and are faster, more flexible and more affordable than any comparable service on the market.

Tjobs has started revolutionizing the global HR Services sector (that has not seen true innovation since the arrival of online job postings in the 1990s), by vastly improving the efficiency of the recruiting process for all stakeholders: employers, candidates and agents.
